title: Hunt Chances
text: The table shows the chance of obtaining certain pets at different rebirths as well as its upgrade cost. Note that you are guaranteed to get a pet from hunting at rebirth **20+**.
credit:
Original by Meowbear#8979
Updated by jadejaguar17

title: Crate Drops
text: All rewards have equal chance of dropping.

title: Karma Sources
text: Karma comes in the form of points and slightly buff progression. You get karma when performing actions that support the bot. This includes donating, activating a global booster, voting, and more. All possible ways are listed in the table below.

title: Tokens Guide
text: This guide is designed for playing the game with **minimal to no globals**. If there are frequent globals, focus more on *Lucky Hunter* and *Cheater* and less on *Merchant* and *Legendary*

title: Prestige Kit Drops
text: Your *Prestige Kit* automatically levels up the more you prestige.
